Package Appointments

Class AppointmentDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • Appointments.AppointmentDAO
  • public class AppointmentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class makes queries to the database This class handles all of the CRUD operations for Appointments with the database
    Author:
    adamb

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addAllAppointments()
      This method gets all appointments from the database A select query gets all appointments and then they are added to an ObservableArrayList

      Updates an appointment in the database New fields for updated appointment are passed from UpdateAppointment screen User is not updated due to constraints and should not change

      • addAllAppointments

        public static void addAllAppointments()
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method gets all appointments from the database A select query gets all appointments and then they are added to an ObservableArrayList
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error querying the database

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        gets all appointments from ObservableArrayList
        Returns:
        ObservableList all appointments

                                  java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  java.lang.String location,

                                  int contactID)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add an appointment to the database
        Parameters:
        id - int ID
        title - String title
        description - String description
        location - String location
        type - String type
        start - LocalDateTime start
        end - LocalDateTime end
        customerID - int customerID
        userID - int userID
        contactID - int contactID

      • deleteAppointment

        public static void deleteAppointment​(int appointmentID)
                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes an appointment from the database
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - int AppointmentID for which appointment is to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there is an error querying the database

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(int appointmentID,
                                     java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                     int customerID,
                                     int contactID)
        Updates an appointment in the database New fields for updated appointment are passed from UpdateAppointment screen User is not updated due to constraints and should not change
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - int appointmentID
        title - String title
        description - String description
        location - String location
        type - String type
        start - LocalDateTime start
        end - LocalDateTime end
        customerID - int customerID
        contactID - int contactID
